Hi,
I've succesfully used Heritrix 1.13.1-200706200612 for massive
crawling=
 on more than 10k seeds. H is running on Tomcat 6 (launched as
a Console ap=
plication) on a Win2k3 64 bit 8 core, 8 GB RAM and JVM 6
64 bit. 

My probl=
em began when I tried to run the same configuration with
Tomcat launched as=
 a Win Service. The problem is that after 1 minute
the bandwidth usage of h=
 fall near to 0, despite of 200 toe-threads
configured and despite of the f=
ull bandwidth usage (as expected) while
Tomcat is launched as a Console app=
lication.
 
After some investigation I found that almost all toe-threads is=

hanging on java.util.logging.StreamHandler.publish(StreamHandler.java:174)=

    java.util.logging.ConsoleHandler.publish(ConsoleHandler.java:88)
....
=

from various component requesting consolle logging.

Here is some of the 2=
00 toe-threads stak dump:
